\u6587\u53165G\u6e2c\u8a66\u6848/SC-16/S: stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command("cmm amfCipheringAlgorithm show | grep \"cipheringAlgPrio1\" | grep -o \"snow3G\|aes\|zuc\" | wc -l\n")
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command("cmm amfCipheringAlgorithm show | grep \"cipheringAlgPrio1\" | grep -o \"none\|noCiphering\" | wc -l")
\u6587\u53165G\u6e2c\u8a66\u6848/AU-3/AU: channel.send("logger 'AU-3 TEST' && grep 'AU-3 TEST' /var/log/syslog | tail -1 | wc -l && grep -E `date '+%b.*%d.*%H'`'.*AU-3 TEST' /var/log/syslog | tail -1 | wc -l && grep -E `hostname`'.*AU-3 TEST' /var/log/syslog | tail -1 | wc -l && grep -E `logname`'.*AU-3 TEST' /var/log/syslog | tail -1 | wc -l && grep -E -i 'Fail*|Succe*' /var/log/syslog | wc -l\n")
\u6587\u53165G\u6e2c\u8a66\u6848/AC-4/In: channel.send("sudo timeout 5 tcpdump -c 50 -i "+interface+" -nn \"arp and not net "+network+"\" 2> /dev/null | wc -l\n")
\u6587\u53165G\u6e2c\u8a66\u6848/AC-3/Ac: channel.send("fsdumpgroups | grep gidNumber | sort | uniq | wc -l\n")
channel.send("sudo cmm-secure-log-analyzer -s | awk '{print$1}' | sed 's\\:$\\\\g' | sort | uniq | wc -l\n")
\u6587\u53165G\u6e2c\u8a66\u6848/MA-4/MA: channel.send("grep -i sshd.*accept /var/log/auth.log | wc -l && grep -i sshd.*open /var/log/auth.log | wc -l && grep -i sshd.*close /var/log/auth.log | wc -l\n")
\u6587\u53165G\u6e2c\u8a66\u6848/IA-4/IA: stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command("fsdumpgroups | grep -A 2 'cn: _nokfsuipmgroot' | grep '^UID:' | awk -F ':' '{print$2}'")
\u6587\u53165G\u6e2c\u8a66\u6848/MA-2/MA: stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command("cmm alarm active list | awk -F '|' '{print$5}' | sed 's/ //g' | grep -v SEVERITY | sort | uniq | sed '1d' |wc -l")
\u6587\u53165G\u6e2c\u8a66\u6848/SI-4/SI: stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command("ping "+logserver_ip+" -c1 -t1 | grep \"time=\" | wc -l\n")
\u6587\u53165G\u6e2c\u8a66\u6848/AU-11/A: channel.send("date -d \"`stat /var/log/\`ls /var/log/ | grep syslog | tail -n 1\` | grep Modify | awk '{print $2}'`\" +%s\n")
channel.send("mkdir /home/`whoami`/AU-11 && cp /var/log/`ls /var/log/ | grep syslog | tail -n 1` /home/`whoami`/AU-11/ && gunzip /home/`whoami`/AU-11/`ls /var/log/ | grep syslog | tail -n 1`\n")
\u6587\u53165G\u6e2c\u8a66\u6848/CA-7_re: stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command("ping "+ping_ip+" -c1 -t1 | grep \"time=\" | wc -l\n")
\u6587\u53165G\u6e2c\u8a66\u6848/AU-7/Au: channel.send(">> `ausearch -tm pts -k cmm-su -i 2>&1 | grep logs | awk '{print$6}'`\n")
\u6587\u53165G\u6e2c\u8a66\u6848/SA-18/S: channel.send(">> `ausearch -tm pts -k cmm-su -i 2>&1 | grep logs | awk '{print$6}'`\n")
\u6587\u53165G\u6e2c\u8a66\u6848/SC-8/SC: stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command("cmm amfIntegrityAlgorithm show | grep \"integrityAlgPrio1\" | grep -o \"snow3G\|aes\|zuc\" | wc -l\n")
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command("cmm amfIntegrityAlgorithm show | grep \"integrityAlgPrio1\" | grep -o \"none\|noCiphering\" | wc -l")
